alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Coffee; Giles; Grundy; Lawrence; Marshall; Rutherford (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 4:56PM CDT until July 18 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Marshall County in Middle Tennessee... Southwestern Rutherford County in Middle Tennessee... Southeastern Lawrence County in Middle Tennessee... Southern Coffee County in Middle Tennessee... Giles County in Middle Tennessee... Bedford County in Middle Tennessee... Southwestern Grundy County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 456 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles south of Murfreesboro to 13 miles west of Ardmore, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Shelbyville, Lewisburg, Manchester, Pulaski, Tullahoma, Monteagle, Chapel Hill, Ardmore, Cornersville, Wartrace, Eagleville, Elkton, Minor Hill, Bell Buckle, Lynnville, Normandy, Raus, Fosterville, Rover and Belfast. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 1 and 35. Interstate 24 between mile markers 101 and 106, and between mile markers 112 and 134. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Bedford; Coffee; Giles; Grundy; Lawrence; Marshall; Rutherford
